thread.title: Brave man battling ‘Elephant Man’ disease undergoes 41 ops to curb bones that will NEVER stop growing
thread.title_full: Brave man battling ‘Elephant Man’ disease undergoes 41 ops to curb bones that will NEVER stop growing

author: adowney
title: Brave man battling ‘Elephant Man’ disease undergoes 41 ops to curb bones that will NEVER stop growing
text:
'KIDS CALLED ME FRANKENSTEIN'S MONSTER' Brave man battling ‘Elephant Man’ disease undergoes 41 ops to curb bones that will NEVER stop growing 
Brian has undergone 41 surgeries to help improve his quality of life and stop his bones from growing, including toe amputations, bone removal from his knee and most recently he's had a lung removed By ANDREA DOWNEY
